game.name: Dead Frontier 2
game.genres: Action, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Remote Play on Tablet
game.shortDescription: Survival horror MMO. As one of the few survivors of the outbreak, you must scratch a living out of the decaying ruins of society. Scavenge for supplies, improve your skills, and trade with other players. All the while, keeping your eyes peeled for the infected lurking around every corner.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survival horror MMO. As one of the few survivors of the outbreak, you must scratch a living out of the decaying ruins of society. Scavenge for supplies, improve your skills, and trade with other players. All the while, keeping your eyes peeled for the infected lurking around every corner.
